about_the_game:
"One Of The Last" has been inspired by some of the classic games including "COD Zombies" and "Left 4 Dead". This demo contains the complete first complete level, including some weapons, perks and barriers. It's just a small glimpse at the much (much!) bigger levels in the full game.

"One Of The Last" has been built upon the best features of those games that inspired us, creating a unique Virtual Reality experience that is NOT another "wave shooter".

Play multi-player with your friends, other demo users AND people who have the full game - play with Vive and Oculus players in the same game!

In the full game you can explore the truth behind the "One Of The Last" world, spread over extensive and large levels (both as single and multi-player games). Solve challenges and puzzles on your own or with friends, build barriers to buy some time, grab perks left by the undead and even power ancient devices with their souls.

Buy weapons from walls ( or if you've spent all your cash ask a friend to buy it for you ) - "One Of The Last" focuses on real multi-player team work when dealing with the horde. Be careful to store those extra items in your pockets and using grenades is a great way to create some slower legless zombies!

The list of features and mechanics already is already extensive, please check out our discussion threads for a list of everything we've currently got! Link :


We are highly active development team, releasing extensive new feature updates every few weeks and work actively with our community to build an exciting, deep and explorative game - we'll see you in the "shotgun corner" :)

Buy weapons from walls ( or if you've spent all your cash ask a friend to buy it for you ) - "One Of The Last" focuses on real multi-player team work when dealing with the horde. Be careful to store those extra items in your pockets and using grenades is a great way to create some slower legless zombies!

name: One Of The Last Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Surviving is more than just head-shots.. Inspired by "COD Zombies" & "L4D" - Explore extensive maps, move freely, join multi-player madness (team work req!), unlocking new areas, grab perks, drink soda-can power-ups, wall-buy weapons, solve ancient puzzles, build barriers, make crawlers and more!!
